channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-3743|2024-08-05T04:50:30.450Z -- hackerone -- hekto
item.description: Open redirect in hekto <=0.2.3 when target domain name is used as html filename on server.

item.title: CVE-2018-3787|2024-08-05T04:50:30.655Z -- hackerone -- simplehttpserver
item.description: Path traversal in simplehttpserver <v0.2.1 allows listing any file on the server.

item.title: CVE-2018-3719|2024-08-05T04:50:30.481Z -- hackerone -- mixin-deep%20node%20module
item.description: mixin-deep node module before 1.3.1 suffers from a Modification of Assumed-Immutable Data (MAID) vulnerability, which allows a malicious user to modify the prototype of "Object" via __proto__, causing the addition or modification of an existing property that will exist on all objects.

item.title: CVE-2018-3755|2024-08-05T04:50:30.615Z -- hackerone -- sexstatic
item.description: XSS in sexstatic <=0.6.2 causes HTML injection in directory name(s) leads to Stored XSS when malicious file is embed with <iframe> element used in directory name.

item.title: CVE-2017-0909|2024-08-05T13:25:17.033Z -- hackerone -- private_address_check%20ruby%20gem
item.description: The private_address_check ruby gem before 0.4.1 is vulnerable to a bypass due to an incomplete blacklist of common private/local network addresses used to prevent server-side request forgery.

item.title: CVE-2018-3723|2024-08-05T04:50:30.400Z -- hackerone -- defaults-deep%20node%20module
item.description: defaults-deep node module before 0.2.4 suffers from a Modification of Assumed-Immutable Data (MAID) vulnerability, which allows a malicious user to modify the prototype of "Object" via __proto__, causing the addition or modification of an existing property that will exist on all objects.

item.title: CVE-2017-0903|2024-08-05T13:25:16.625Z -- hackerone -- rubygems
item.description: RubyGems versions between 2.0.0 and 2.6.13 are vulnerable to a possible remote code execution vulnerability. YAML deserialization of gem specifications can bypass class white lists. Specially crafted serialized objects can possibly be used to escalate to remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-16480|2024-08-05T10:24:32.712Z -- hackerone -- public
item.description: A XSS vulnerability was found in module public <0.1.4 that allows malicious Javascript code to run in the browser, due to the absence of sanitization of the file/folder names before rendering.

item.title: CVE-2018-16469|2024-08-05T10:24:32.373Z -- hackerone -- merge
item.description: The merge.recursive function in the merge package <1.2.1 can be tricked into adding or modifying properties of the Object prototype. These properties will be present on all objects allowing for a denial of service attack.

item.title: CVE-2018-3721|2024-08-05T04:50:30.535Z -- hackerone -- lodash%20node%20module
item.description: lodash node module before 4.17.5 suffers from a Modification of Assumed-Immutable Data (MAID) vulnerability via defaultsDeep, merge, and mergeWith functions, which allows a malicious user to modify the prototype of "Object" via __proto__, causing the addition or modification of an existing property that will exist on all objects.

item.title: CVE-2018-16479|2024-08-05T10:24:32.597Z -- hackerone -- http-live-simulator
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in http-live-simulator <1.0.7 causes unauthorized access to arbitrary files on disk by appending extra slashes after the URL.

item.title: CVE-2018-3711|2024-08-05T04:50:30.427Z -- hackerone -- fastify%20node%20module
item.description: Fastify node module before 0.38.0 is vulnerable to a denial-of-service attack by sending a request with "Content-Type: application/json" and a very large payload.

item.title: CVE-2017-0928|2024-08-05T13:25:17.041Z -- hackerone -- html-janitor%20node%20module
item.description: html-janitor node module suffers from an External Control of Critical State Data vulnerability via user-control of the '_sanitized' variable causing sanitization to be bypassed.

item.title: CVE-2018-3778|2024-08-05T04:50:30.838Z -- hackerone -- aedes
item.description: Improper authorization in aedes version <0.35.0 will publish a LWT in a channel when a client is not authorized.

item.title: CVE-2017-0938|2024-08-05T13:25:17.343Z -- hackerone -- airmax%2C%20edgemax
item.description: Denial of Service attack in airMAX < 8.3.2 , airMAX < 6.0.7 and EdgeMAX < 1.9.7 allow attackers to use the Discovery Protocol in amplification attacks.

item.title: CVE-2018-3774|2024-08-05T04:50:30.463Z -- hackerone -- url-parse
item.description: Incorrect parsing in url-parse <1.4.3 returns wrong hostname which leads to multiple vulnerabilities such as SSRF, Open Redirect, Bypass Authentication Protocol.

item.title: CVE-2018-3712|2024-08-05T04:50:30.552Z -- hackerone -- serve%20node%20module
item.description: serve node module before 6.4.9 suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to not handling %2e (.) and %2f (/) and allowing them in paths, which allows a malicious user to view the contents of any directory with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-3720|2024-08-05T04:50:30.425Z -- hackerone -- assign-deep%20node%20module
item.description: assign-deep node module before 0.4.7 suffers from a Modification of Assumed-Immutable Data (MAID) vulnerability, which allows a malicious user to modify the prototype of "Object" via __proto__, causing the addition or modification of an existing property that will exist on all objects.

item.title: CVE-2018-3760|2024-08-05T04:50:30.511Z -- hackerone -- sprockets
item.description: There is an information leak vulnerability in Sprockets. Versions Affected: 4.0.0.beta7 and lower, 3.7.1 and lower, 2.12.4 and lower. Specially crafted requests can be used to access files that exists on the filesystem that is outside an application's root directory, when the Sprockets server is used in production. All users running an affected release should either upgrade or use one of the work arounds immediately.

item.title: CVE-2018-3730|2024-08-05T04:50:30.421Z -- hackerone -- mcstatic%20node%20module
item.description: mcstatic node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of filePath, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-3746|2024-08-05T04:50:30.717Z -- hackerone -- pdfinfojs
item.description: The pdfinfojs NPM module versions <= 0.3.6 has a command injection vulnerability that allows an attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the victim's machine.

item.title: CVE-2018-3732|2024-08-05T04:50:30.942Z -- hackerone -- resolve-path%20node%20module
item.description: resolve-path node module before 1.4.0 suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of paths with certain special characters, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-16492|2024-08-05T10:24:32.840Z -- hackerone -- extend
item.description: A prototype pollution vulnerability was found in module extend <2.0.2, ~<3.0.2 that allows an attacker to inject arbitrary properties onto Object.prototype.

item.title: CVE-2018-3733|2024-08-05T04:50:30.607Z -- hackerone -- crud-file-server%20node%20module
item.description: crud-file-server node module before 0.9.0 suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to incorrect validation of url, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2017-0930|2024-08-05T13:25:16.948Z -- hackerone -- augustine%20node%20module
item.description: augustine node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of url, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-3713|2024-08-05T04:50:30.506Z -- hackerone -- angular-http-server%20node%20module
item.description: angular-http-server node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of possibleFilename, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-16486|2024-08-05T10:24:32.798Z -- hackerone -- defaults-deep
item.description: A prototype pollution vulnerability was found in defaults-deep <=0.2.4 that would allow a malicious user to inject properties onto Object.prototype.

item.title: CVE-2018-3735|2024-08-05T04:50:30.452Z -- hackerone -- bracket-template%20node%20module
item.description: bracket-template suffers from reflected XSS possible when variable passed via GET parameter is used in template

item.title: CVE-2017-0899|2024-08-05T13:25:16.395Z -- hackerone -- rubygems
item.description: RubyGems version 2.6.12 and earlier is vulnerable to maliciously crafted gem specifications that include terminal escape characters. Printing the gem specification would execute terminal escape sequences.

item.title: CVE-2018-3744|2024-08-05T04:50:30.650Z -- hackerone -- html-pages%20node%20module
item.description: The html-pages node module contains a path traversal vulnerabilities that allows an attacker to read any file from the server with cURL.

item.title: CVE-2018-16481|2024-08-05T10:24:32.672Z -- hackerone -- html-pages
item.description: A XSS vulnerability was found in html-page <=2.1.1 that allows malicious Javascript code to be executed in the user's browser due to the absence of sanitization of the paths before rendering.

item.title: CVE-2018-16491|2024-08-05T10:24:32.711Z -- hackerone -- node.extend
item.description: A prototype pollution vulnerability was found in node.extend <1.1.7, ~<2.0.1 that allows an attacker to inject arbitrary properties onto Object.prototype.

item.title: CVE-2018-3716|2024-08-05T04:50:30.432Z -- hackerone -- simplehttpserver%20node%20module
item.description: simplehttpserver node module suffers from a Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability to a lack of validation of file names.

item.title: CVE-2018-3745|2024-08-05T04:50:30.728Z -- hackerone -- atob%20node%20module
item.description: atob 2.0.3 and earlier allocates uninitialized Buffers when number is passed in input on Node.js 4.x and below.

item.title: CVE-2018-3776|2024-08-05T04:50:30.811Z -- hackerone -- nextcloud%20server
item.description: Improper input validator in Nextcloud Server prior to 12.0.3 and 11.0.5 could lead to an attacker's actions not being logged in the audit log.

item.title: CVE-2018-16485|2024-08-05T10:24:32.559Z -- hackerone -- m-server
item.description: Path Traversal vulnerability in module m-server <1.4.1 allows malicious user to access unauthorized content of any file in the directory tree e.g. /etc/passwd by appending slashes to the URL request.

item.title: CVE-2018-16484|2024-08-05T10:24:32.703Z -- hackerone -- m-server
item.description: A XSS vulnerability was found in module m-server <1.4.2 that allows malicious Javascript code or HTML to be executed, due to the lack of escaping for special characters in folder names.

item.title: CVE-2018-3724|2024-08-05T04:50:30.482Z -- hackerone -- general-file-server%20node%20module
item.description: general-file-server node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of currpath, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-16489|2024-08-05T10:24:32.562Z -- hackerone -- just-extend
item.description: A prototype pollution vulnerability was found in just-extend <4.0.0 that allows attack to inject properties onto Object.prototype through its functions.

item.title: CVE-2018-3729|2024-08-05T04:50:30.404Z -- hackerone -- localhost-now%20node%20module
item.description: localhost-now node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of file, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-16482|2024-08-05T10:24:32.435Z -- hackerone -- mcstatic
item.description: A server directory traversal vulnerability was found on node module mcstatic <=0.0.20 that would allow an attack to access sensitive information in the file system by appending slashes in the URL path.

item.title: CVE-2018-3725|2024-08-05T04:50:30.480Z -- hackerone -- hekto%20node%20module
item.description: hekto node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of file, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-3734|2024-08-05T04:50:30.569Z -- hackerone -- stattic%20node%20module
item.description: stattic node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of path, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-3779|2024-08-05T04:50:30.831Z -- hackerone -- active-support%20ruby%20gem
item.description: active-support ruby gem 5.2.0 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by containing a malicious backdoor. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.

item.title: CVE-2018-3715|2024-08-05T04:50:30.482Z -- hackerone -- glance%20node%20module
item.description: glance node module before 3.0.4 suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of path passed to it, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-3737|2024-08-05T04:50:30.537Z -- hackerone -- sshpk%20node%20module
item.description: sshpk is vulnerable to ReDoS when parsing crafted invalid public keys.

item.title: CVE-2018-3722|2024-08-05T04:50:30.529Z -- hackerone -- merge-deep%20node%20module
item.description: merge-deep node module before 3.0.1 suffers from a Modification of Assumed-Immutable Data (MAID) vulnerability, which allows a malicious user to modify the prototype of "Object" via __proto__, causing the addition or modification of an existing property that will exist on all objects.

item.title: CVE-2017-0901|2024-08-05T13:25:17.073Z -- hackerone -- rubygems
item.description: RubyGems version 2.6.12 and earlier fails to validate specification names, allowing a maliciously crafted gem to potentially overwrite any file on the filesystem.

item.title: CVE-2018-16483|2024-08-05T10:24:32.838Z -- hackerone -- express-cart
item.description: A deficiency in the access control in module express-cart <=1.1.5 allows unprivileged users to add new users to the application as administrators.

item.title: CVE-2018-3731|2024-08-05T04:50:30.499Z -- hackerone -- public%20node%20module
item.description: public node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of filePath, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-3739|2024-08-05T04:50:30.725Z -- hackerone -- https-proxy-agent%20node%20module
item.description: https-proxy-agent before 2.1.1 passes auth option to the Buffer constructor without proper sanitization, resulting in DoS and uninitialized memory leak in setups where an attacker could submit typed input to the 'auth' parameter (e.g. JSON).

item.title: CVE-2018-3727|2024-08-05T04:50:30.455Z -- hackerone -- 626%20node%20module
item.description: 626 node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of file, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-3758|2024-08-05T04:50:30.444Z -- hackerone -- express-cart
item.description: Unrestricted file upload (RCE) in express-cart module before 1.1.7 allows a privileged user to gain access in the hosting machine.

item.title: CVE-2017-0898|2024-08-05T13:25:17.095Z -- hackerone -- ruby
item.description: Ruby before 2.4.2, 2.3.5, and 2.2.8 is vulnerable to a malicious format string which contains a precious specifier (*) with a huge minus value. Such situation can lead to a buffer overrun, resulting in a heap memory corruption or an information disclosure from the heap.

item.title: CVE-2017-0931|2024-08-05T13:25:17.103Z -- hackerone -- html-janitor%20node%20module
item.description: html-janitor node module suffers from a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability via clean() accepting user-controlled values.

item.title: CVE-2017-0902|2024-08-05T13:25:16.566Z -- hackerone -- rubygems
item.description: RubyGems version 2.6.12 and earlier is vulnerable to a DNS hijacking vulnerability that allows a MITM attacker to force the RubyGems client to download and install gems from a server that the attacker controls.

item.title: CVE-2018-3775|2024-08-05T04:50:30.743Z -- hackerone -- nextcloud%20server
item.description: Improper Authentication in Nextcloud Server prior to version 12.0.3 would allow an attacker that obtained user credentials to bypass the 2 Factor Authentication.

item.title: CVE-2018-3717|2024-08-05T04:50:30.442Z -- hackerone -- connect%20node%20module
item.description: connect node module before 2.14.0 suffers from a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability due to a lack of validation of file in directory.js middleware.

item.title: CVE-2018-3738|2024-08-05T04:50:30.569Z -- hackerone -- protobufjs%20node%20module
item.description: protobufjs is vulnerable to ReDoS when parsing crafted invalid .proto files.

item.title: CVE-2018-16487|2024-08-05T10:24:32.702Z -- hackerone -- lodash
item.description: A prototype pollution vulnerability was found in lodash <4.17.11 where the functions merge, mergeWith, and defaultsDeep can be tricked into adding or modifying properties of Object.prototype.

item.title: CVE-2018-3726|2024-08-05T04:50:30.432Z -- hackerone -- crud-file-server%20node%20module
item.description: crud-file-server node module before 0.8.0 suffers from a Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability to a lack of validation of file names.

item.title: CVE-2018-3770|2024-08-05T04:50:30.726Z -- hackerone -- markdown-pdf
item.description: A path traversal exists in markdown-pdf version <9.0.0 that allows a user to insert a malicious html code that can result in reading the local files.

item.title: CVE-2018-16490|2024-08-05T10:24:32.842Z -- hackerone -- mpath
item.description: A prototype pollution vulnerability was found in module mpath <0.5.1 that allows an attacker to inject arbitrary properties onto Object.prototype.

item.title: CVE-2018-3759|2024-08-05T04:50:30.727Z -- hackerone -- private_address_check%20ruby%20gem
item.description: private_address_check ruby gem before 0.5.0 is vulnerable to a time-of-check time-of-use (TOCTOU) race condition due to the address the socket uses not being checked. DNS entries with a TTL of 0 can trigger this case where the initial resolution is a public address but the subsequent resolution is a private address.

item.title: CVE-2018-3718|2024-08-05T04:50:30.645Z -- hackerone -- serve%20node%20module
item.description: serve node module suffers from Improper Handling of URL Encoding by permitting access to ignored files if a filename is URL encoded.

item.title: CVE-2018-16493|2024-08-05T10:24:32.903Z -- hackerone -- static-resource-server
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability was found in module static-resource-server 1.7.2 that allows unauthorized read access to any file on the server by appending slashes in the URL.

item.title: CVE-2018-3714|2024-08-05T04:50:30.553Z -- hackerone -- node-srv%20node%20module
item.description: node-srv node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of url, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2018-3771|2024-08-05T04:50:30.634Z -- hackerone -- statics-server
item.description: An XSS in statics-server <= 0.0.9 can be used via injected iframe in the filename when statics-server displays directory index in the browser.
